justification: Recognizes B’s dislike of volatility (moving off a volatile RB) but ignores key beliefs: B already has a Tier 1 TE (Thomas), values stable volume, and needs active RB depth. Offering a Tier 2 TE plus an OUT WR as a “steadier WR” misreads B’s priorities despite their willingness to buy low on injuries. The trade is roster-incoherent for B and the acceptance probability is overstated. Reasoning is brief and factually off.
